mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APP_FRIGE_CONTENTS_LIST_TB VALUES(0, list_id.nextval, #{content_nm}, (SELECT content_ty FROM APP_FRIGE_CONTENTS_TB WHERE irdnt_nm LIKE #{content_nm}), SYSDATE, SYSDATE+(SELECT due_date FROM APP_FRIGE_CONTENTS_TB WHERE irdnt_nm LIKE #{content_nm}), 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT a.content_nm, b.content_ty, a.shelf_life_end FROM APP_FRIGE_CONTENTS_LIST_TB a, APP_FRIGE_CONTENTS_TB b WHERE a.content_nm = b.irdnt_nm AND b.content_ty LIKE '#{content_ty}' ORDER BY a.shelf_life_end ASC
